alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 8:07PM EDT until September 07 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wakulla County in Big Bend Florida... Southeastern Liberty County in Big Bend Florida... Northeastern Franklin County in Big Bend Florida... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 807 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Woodville to 9 miles northwest of Crawfordville to 13 miles southwest of Midway, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, St. Marks, Sopchoppy, Newport, Shadeville, Hyde Park, Panacea-Wakulla Airport, Arran, Mcintyre, Sanborn, Tully, Plum Orchard, Panacea, Shell Point, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek, Port Leon, Medart, Wakulla Beach, and Buckhorn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
